entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Fix the bug of escape code inside regex keep causing ide to crash #59249
    Backlog
  • Behavior changed for [CallerArgumentExpression] in constructor for [InterpolatedStringHandler] for the receiver parameter #59661
    17.2
  • Investigate why „ ” in Polish translations doesn't show correctlly #58994
  • Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow inside raw string literals does not behave as expected #59581
    17.2
  • Interpolated raw string literals don't handle double braces correctly #59603
    17.2
  • AliasSymbol.Equals throw NullReferenceException when comparing two global symbols #58999
    17.2

Updated

  • Roslyn crashes when compiling with NoStdLib flag #58942
    Backlog
  • `<exception>` tag does not limit available `cref` symbols to exceptions #59257
    Backlog
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
    17.2
  • "Convert to switch statement" refactoring generates invalid code #59616
  • Editor doesn't render documentation comments properly #58966
    17.2
  • Visual Studio 17.1 brown error messages when Source Generator triggered while generated files are open #59633
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #59209
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add build step to generate SBOM #59663
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle binary files in AdditionalTextComparer.GetHashCode #59660
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

Merged

  • Fix text structure navigation for raw strings. #59656
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue with curlies being innapropriately unescaped in raw string literals. #59607
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move GenerateOverridesOptions and BlockStructureOptions to global options #59508
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null-ref in `AliasSymbol.Equals` #59649
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Global ide analyzer options #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • SyntaxWrappingOptions #59604
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Additional tests for lambda attributes, explicit return type, and inferred delegate type #59634
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
